backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with authorization and storage mixins plus all domain types for products, shops, claims, messaging, delivery, and carts.
backend/migration.mo: Implements a migration that upgrades old products to the new product schema by adding default fields like returnPolicy and verification labels.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence records listing feature IDs, affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human‑written summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and theme settings for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React Query client and TanStack Router routes for all major pages of the app.
Wrapper that restricts access to admin-only content, showing loading, denial, or the protected children based on admin status.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Navigation header that builds menu options based on authentication, shopkeeper status, and admin rights, including notification badges and mobile/desktop layouts.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper that renders the header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Gate component that shows a login prompt or loading state when the user is unauthenticated, otherwise renders its children.
frontend/src/components/BargainRequestFo: Dialog form allowing authenticated users to submit a bargain offer with desired price and optional note.
frontend/src/components/BestDealRequestB: Button that sends a zero‑price 'best deal' bargain request if the user is logged in.
frontend/src/components/claims/ClaimDesc: Provides a textarea with validation for entering a detailed claim description and displays character count and warnings.
frontend/src/components/claims/ClaimItem: Lets users select a product or general claim and shows details of the selected item using a radio list and summary card.
frontend/src/components/claims/ClaimStat: Displays claim progress through status steps and shows expected resolution time and outcome messages.
frontend/src/components/claims/ClaimStep: Renders a multi-step visual progress indicator for the claim submission process.
frontend/src/components/claims/ClaimType: Allows users to choose a claim category from predefined types with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/claims/ProofUplo: Handles uploading, validating, previewing, and removing proof files with progress tracking and error messages.
frontend/src/components/CompareAcrossSho: Section that sorts and displays alternative shop listings for a product with price, rating, and distance, linking to each product page.
frontend/src/components/DeliveryOptionsP: Panel for choosing delivery or pickup options after a bargain is accepted, with simple fee calculation and order-state handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with loading state and automatic retry handling.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Shows product photos with navigation controls and thumbnails, or a placeholder when no images exist.
Handles selecting, validating, previewing, and removing product photos with upload progress tracking.
Shows a product photo thumbnail or a placeholder icon if none exists.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportSe: Displays a dialog for submitting seller reports with basic validation and mock submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and initializes stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for products, shops, cart, and mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and a warm-toned light/dark color palette for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMonitoringPage.t: Renders an admin-only monitoring dashboard with tabs for deal protection orders, seller reports, and claims, all currently showing placeholder empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart items, totals, error/loading states, and allows navigation to checkout, product browsing, or filing a claim.
frontend/src/pages/ClaimsPage.tsx: Lists the user's claims with loading handling; currently displays an empty-state card and a button to file a new claim.
frontend/src/pages/ClaimSubmittedPage.ts: Shows a confirmation screen after submitting a claim, with status info and navigation options back to claims or home.
frontend/src/pages/ClaimWizardPage.tsx: Provides a placeholder claim submission flow, showing setup-in-progress messaging and navigation back to the claims list.
frontend/src/pages/DeliveryOrderDetailsP: Shows a placeholder page for delivery order details indicating the system is not yet implemented, with navigation and a seller report dialog.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesThreadPage.ts: Displays a messaging thread for a product, loading messages and participant info, sending new messages, and handling error or missing product states.
Provides a dashboard for delivery partners to register with personal details and toggle their availability status.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product information, handles cart actions, likes, and shows related shop and comparison data.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Shows the user's submitted reports, currently displaying a placeholder when no reports exist.
frontend/src/pages/ShopDiscoveryPage.tsx: Lists products with filtering and sorting options, offering a discovery experience across shops.
frontend/src/pages/ShopkeeperInboxPage.t: Lets shopkeepers view and open customer message threads, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ShopkeeperNotificatio: Displays notifications for shopkeepers about customer interactions like likes and cart additions.
frontend/src/pages/ShopkeeperProductsPag: Manages a shopkeeper's product list and provides UI and logic for creating new products, including validation and file uploads.
frontend/src/pages/ShopkeeperProfileForm: Form page for creating a shop profile with validation and submission via createShopProfile mutation.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Displays the user's wishlist, handles removal of liked products, and shows product and shop details.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Normalizes various backend errors into readable messages and identifies authentication-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Formats bigint prices into INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/phoneLinks.ts: Generates WhatsApp and tel links by cleaning and formatting phone numbers.
frontend/src/utils/productComparison.ts: Provides functions to find matching products and sort listings by price, rating, or distance.
frontend/src/utils/productCondition.ts: Maps product condition enums to display labels and badge variants.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL or session-based parameters for navigation state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, typography/container-query/animate plugins, and extended theme settings including animations and OKLCH color variables.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, current feature implementations, and pending feature requests related to used-product details, verification labels, return policy, and multi-image uploads.
